name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Anthony WRIGHT, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Anthony WRIGHT, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of June, 2008, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
Whether the existence of a voluntary confession precludes a ;prima facie finding that exculpatory results from DNA testing under 42 Pa.C.S. § 9543.1 would establish actual innocence.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
951 A.2d 263
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Anthony WRIGHT, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 25, 2008.
